result.eng: As is usual all over Europe.
result.ga: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.orig: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.html: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.
result.ponchtml: De réir mar is gnáċ ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.

result.eng: I usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ga: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.orig: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.html: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ponchtml: Is gnáċ dom éisteaċt go géar ag na léaċtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.

result.eng: As usual, the bus is late.
result.ga: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.orig: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhus
result.html: Mar is gnách tá moill ar an bhusAs usual, the bus is late.
result.ponchtml: Mar is gnáċ tá moill ar an ḃusAs usual, the bus is late.

result.eng: Immigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ga: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.orig: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircigh
result.html: Ní gnách Béarla maith a bheith ag inimircighImmigrants usually don't speak good English.
result.ponchtml: Ní gnáċ Béarla maiṫ a ḃeiṫ ag inimirciġImmigrants usually don't speak good English.
